title: G73 Demo
description:
Do you need to heat your garage or work-space when the weather turns cold?
In this video we take a look at the G73 garage heater from Newair.

This heater is our most popular garage heater. It has received a lot of great reviews; people are impressed that it works so powerfully for its small size; and that it can heat up so quickly.

It can be wall, or ceiling mounted; the bracket that comes with it can go either way. This is really good for saving floor space, and for keeping it out of the way. It comes with the mounting bracket, and everything you need to install it. It has to be hard-wired, but it’s still pretty easy to set up; one reviewer said the install was actually really simple, and within about an hour they were working on a project in their garage, feeling good. Please check out the reviews on the web page for tips on setting it up, or give us a call, we’re always happy to help.

It uses fan-forced heating to move the air, so it heats up the room faster. And it tuns out an amazing 17,000 BTU’s of heat, which is enough to warm up a space of about 500 square feet, or more. We’ve had reviewers say they use it in larger spaces like open rooms, and a warehouse; one reviewer said they work at a scrap metal recycling yard and that they tried multiple types of heaters, but nothing worked as well as this one.

It’s easy to use. To operate the automatic thermostat, set the level by turning the dial clockwise, then once it’s as warm as you want, turn it counter-clockwise slightly until you hear a click, then the thermostat will automatically adjust to keep that temperature constant. 

See the video for how the G73 space heater from Newair is the perfect solution.

transcripts: Hi I'm Emily and today we'll be taking a look at the G73 space heater from NewAir. This heater has received great reviews customers are so surprised how powerful it is for its small size and that it can heat up so quickly. It can be wall or ceiling mounted, the bracket that comes with it can be used for both this is great for saving floor space and keeping it out of the way. It comes with a mounting bracket and everything you need to set it up it does have to be hard wired but that still makes installing it pretty easy. One reviewer said that's after about an hour they were working on a project in their garage feeling good. It uses fan-forced heating to move the air being able to heat up a room much faster and it turns out an amazing 17,000 BTU’s of heat. We've had reviewers say that they used in larger spaces such as open rooms, warehouses we even had a reviewer that said that they worked out of scrap metal recycling yard and they tried many different heaters but none of them worked as well as this one. It's easy to use you can set the level and once it's warm as you want turn it slightly until you hear a click then the thermostat will automatically adjust to keep it at that desire temperature. You're also able to change the direction of the heat by simply moving the louvers. Thank you for taking a look with me today at the G73 garage heater from NewAir. At NewAir trust is important to us we test each product line before we put it on the market to make sure it's reliable. We have a world-class dependable dedicated customer service team so your calls and emails go to real people and we've been doing this since 2002 so we've built a reputation as one of the best customer review companies online that's why NewAir is a name you can trust.
